content: silken breeze top effortless elegance for warm days the silken breeze top is a light and breezy sleeveless knit designed for drape and comfort made in fingering weight silk it flatters with a soft silhouette clean lines and thoughtfully graded shaping silken breeze top is knit top down and features a polished i-cord cast-on and bind-off slipped stitch edges and optional waist shaping this seamless top is knit flat to the underarms and then joined in the round for a smooth finish the pattern is fully graded for eight sizes with detailed shaping instructions a yardage chart and modeled photos for reference whether paired with linen pants or layered under a jacket the silken breeze top will be your go-to piece for graceful breathable comfort all season long
